channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Three chapters at Cloudflare: Programmer to CTO to Board of Directors】CloudFlare的三章：编程人员到CTO董事会
item.description: 【 Today, after more than 13 years at the company, I am joining Cloudflare’s board of directors and retiring from my full-time position as CTO. 】今天，在公司工作了13多年之后，我加入了Cloudflare的董事会，并从我作为CTO的全职职位退休。

item.title: 【“You get Instant Purge, and you get Instant Purge!” — all purge methods now available to all customers】“您会立即清除，然后即时清除！” - 所有客户现在都可以使用所有清除方法
item.description: 【 Following up on having the fastest purge in the industry, we have now increased Instant Purge quotas across all Cloudflare plans. 】跟进行业中最快的清除，我们现在已经增加了所有Cloudflare计划的即时清除配额。

item.title: 【A steam locomotive from 1993 broke my yarn test】1993年以来的蒸汽机车打破了我的纱线测试
item.description: 【 Yarn tests fail consistently at the 27-second mark. The usual suspects are swiftly eliminated. A deep dive is taken to comb through traces, only to be derailed into an unexpected crash investigation. 】纱线测试以27秒的成绩持续失败。通常的嫌疑人被迅速消除。深入潜水是为了梳理痕迹，只是脱轨到意外的崩溃调查中。

item.title: 【Improve your media pipelines with the Images binding for Cloudflare Workers】通过对Cloudflare工人的绑定来改善媒体管道
item.description: 【 Media-rich applications require image and video pipelines that integrate seamlessly with the rest of your technology stack. Here’s how the Images binding enables you to build more flexible workflows. 】媒体丰富的应用程序需要图像和视频管道，以与您的其余技术堆栈无缝集成。这是图像绑定的方式使您能够构建更灵活的工作流程。

item.title: 【Project Jengo for Sable — final winners!】Sable项目Jengo - 最终获胜者！
item.description: 【 With Cloudflare’s victory against patent trolls Sable IP and Sable Networks in the books, it’s time to close out the case’s Project Jengo competition. 】随着Cloudflare在书籍中击败专利巨魔IP和黑貂网络的胜利，是时候结束案件的Jengo竞赛了。

item.title: 【Build and deploy Remote Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers to Cloudflare】构建和部署远程模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器到CloudFlare
item.description: 【 You can now build and deploy remote MCP servers to Cloudflare, and we handle the hard parts of building remote MCP servers for you. 】现在，您可以构建和部署远程MCP服务器来cloudflare，并且我们处理为您构建远程MCP服务器的困难部分。

item.title: 【Meta’s Llama 4 is now available on Workers AI】Meta的Llama 4现在可以在工人AI上使用
item.description: 【 Llama 4 Scout 17B Instruct is now available on Workers AI: use this multimodal, Mixture of Experts AI model on Cloudflare's serverless AI platform to build next-gen AI applications. 】Llama 4 Scout 17B指令现在可以在工人AI上使用：在Cloudflare的无服务器AI平台上使用这种多模式AI模型的混合物来构建下一代AI应用程序。

item.title: 【Welcome to Developer Week 2025】欢迎来到开发人员2025周
item.description: 【 We’re kicking off Cloudflare’s 2025 Developer Week — our innovation week dedicated to announcements for developers. 】我们将启动Cloudflare的2025年开发者周 - 我们的创新周致力于开发人员的公告。

item.title: 【Cloudflare’s commitment to CISA Secure-By-Design pledge: delivering new kernels, faster】Cloudflare对CISA安全性的承诺的承诺：提供新内核，更快
item.description: 【 Cloudflare’s commitment to the CISA pledge reflects our dedication to transparency and accountability to our customers. This blog post outlines how we deliver newly patched kernels across our 】Cloudflare对CISA承诺的承诺反映了我们对客户对透明度和问责制的奉献精神。这篇博客文章概述了我们如何在我们的

item.title: 【Open-sourcing OpenPubkey SSH (OPKSSH): integrating single sign-on with SSH】开源OpenPubkey SSH（OPKSSH）：将单个登录与SSH集成
item.description: 【 OPKSSH (OpenPubkey SSH) is now open-sourced as part of the OpenPubkey project. 】Opkssh（OpenPubkey SSH）现在是开源的，作为OpenPubkey项目的一部分。
